trans-unit.source: *.mo
trans-unit.target: *.mo

trans-unit.source: About
trans-unit.target: 关于我们

trans-unit.source: Added Dutch (nl) translation. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Dodano tłumaczenie na język niderlandzki (nl).[WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Added basque (eu) translation. [erral]
trans-unit.target: Dodano tłumaczenie baskijskie (eu).[erral]

trans-unit.source: Added bulk upload capability. [erikrose]
trans-unit.target: Dodano możliwość masowego przesyłania danych.[erikrose]

trans-unit.source: Added default validators and actions. [spamsch]
trans-unit.target: Dodano domyślne walidatory i akcje.[spamsch]

trans-unit.source: Added german translation. [spamsch]
trans-unit.target: Dodano tłumaczenie na język niemiecki.[spamsch]

trans-unit.source: Added icon to control panel GS file. [ggozad]
trans-unit.target: Dodano ikonę do pliku GS panelu sterowania.[ggozad]

trans-unit.source: Added notification for when a user is managing the aliases of a default item in a container instead of the container with a link. Took idea and implementation from the @@sharing control panel. [dunlapm]
trans-unit.target: Dodano powiadomienie o tym,że użytkownik zarządza aliasami domyślnego elementu w kontenerze zamiast w kontenerze z linkiem.Podjęcie pomysłu i implementacji z panelu sterowania @@@sharing.[dunlapm]

trans-unit.source: Added the z3c.autoinclude entry point so this package is automatically loaded on Plone 3.3 and above. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Dodano punkt wejścia z3c.autoinclude,więc ten pakiet jest automatycznie ładowany na Plone 3.3 i wyżej.[WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Added upgrade step to allow control panel icon upgrade to happen without reinstalling. [davidjb]
trans-unit.target: Dodano krok aktualizacji,aby umożliwić aktualizację ikony panelu sterowania bez konieczności ponownej instalacji.[davidjb]

trans-unit.source: Bulk upload by Erik Rose of WebLion.
trans-unit.target: Bulk upload by Erik Rose of WebLion.

trans-unit.source: Changed IRedirectionTool into a Zope 3 interface. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Zmieniono narzędzie IRedirectionTool na interfejs Zope 3.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Click Add.
trans-unit.target: 单击 "添加"。

trans-unit.source: Click the Aliases tab.
trans-unit.target: 单击 "别名 "选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: 学分

trans-unit.source: Enter the short name or the absolute path that should redirect to the content.
trans-unit.target: 输入应该重定向到内容的简短名称或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Expanded readme and packaged the release. [erikrose]
trans-unit.target: Rozszerzył readme i zapakował zwolnienie.[erikrose]

trans-unit.source: Fix package dependencies. [hvelarde]
trans-unit.target: 修正包的依赖性。[hvelarde]

trans-unit.source: Fixed bugs that caused incorrect display of redirects on the @@manage-aliases and @@aliases-controlpanel pages. [hexsprite]
trans-unit.target: Naprawiono błędy,które powodowały nieprawidłowe wyświetlanie przekierowań na stronach @@manage-aliases i @@aliases-controlpanel.[hexsprite]

trans-unit.source: Fixed the
trans-unit.target: 修复了

trans-unit.source: Include CMFCore permission on Plone 4.1 [rich_lewis2]
trans-unit.target: Uwzględnić pozwolenie CMFCore na Plone 4.1 [rich_lewis2]

trans-unit.source: Manage aliases
trans-unit.target: Zarządzaj pseudonimami

trans-unit.source: Moved ActionProviderBase before SimpleItem so that actions tab is shown in ZMI
trans-unit.target: Przeniesienie bazy danych ActionProviderBase przed SimpleItem,tak aby karta akcji była widoczna w ZMI

trans-unit.source: Navigate to that content.
trans-unit.target: 导航到该内容。

trans-unit.source: Originally created by Helge Tesdal at Plone Solutions sponsored by Learning Lab Denmark.
trans-unit.target: Originally created by Helge Tesdal at Plone Solutions sponsored by Learning Lab Denmark.

trans-unit.source: Prior 1.2
trans-unit.target: Priorytet 1.2

trans-unit.source: Products.RedirectionTool
trans-unit.target: 产品.重定向工具

trans-unit.source: Regenerated PO files. [erral]
trans-unit.target: Regenerowane pliki PO.[erral]

trans-unit.source: Removed all
trans-unit.target: 删除了所有

trans-unit.source: Removed tabindex to work with Plone 4. [stonor]
trans-unit.target: Usunięty tabindex do pracy z Plone 4.[Stonor]

trans-unit.source: Removed version.txt to avoid deprecation-warning on Zope-startup. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Usunięto wersję.txt,aby uniknąć ostrzeżenia o deprecjacji na Zope-startup.[WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Reorganised *.txt-files into toplevel-folder or /docs-folder to match current best-practices. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Zreorganizowano pliki *.txt do folderu toplevel lub /docs,aby dopasować je do aktualnych najlepszych praktyk.[WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Repository moved to github [cewing]
trans-unit.target: Składowisko przeniesione do githuba [cewing]

trans-unit.source: Take into account site property allowAnonymousViewAbout in not_found_message
trans-unit.target: Uwzględnij właściwość strony allowAnonymousViewAbout w not_found_message

trans-unit.source: The Redirection Tool allows the management of the aliases stored in plone.app.redirector.
trans-unit.target: The Redirection Tool allows the management of the aliases stored in plone.app.redirector.

trans-unit.source: The Redirection Tool allows the management of the aliases stored in plone.app.redirector
trans-unit.target: 重定向工具允许管理存储在plone.app.redirector中的别名。

trans-unit.source: The Redirection Tool is released under the GPL licence.
trans-unit.target: 重定向工具是在GPL许可下发布的。

trans-unit.source: There is also a Redirection and Aliases control panel under Site Setup which presents all the redirections in the site in one place, allows enabling and disabling alias management per content type, and lets you upload redirections in bulk.
trans-unit.target: 在网站设置下还有一个重定向和别名控制面板,它可以在一个地方显示网站中的所有重定向,允许启用和禁用每个内容类型的别名管理,并允许您批量上传重定向。

trans-unit.source: To make a redirection to a piece of content…
trans-unit.target: To make a redirection to a piece of content…

trans-unit.source: Update Brazilian Portuguese and Spanish translations. [hvelarde]
trans-unit.target: 更新巴西葡萄牙语和西班牙语翻译。[hvelarde]

trans-unit.source: Updated for Plone 3 by Florian Schulze at Plone Solutions.
trans-unit.target: Updated for Plone 3 by Florian Schulze at Plone Solutions.

trans-unit.source: Updated for Plone 3 by using plone.app.redirector, replacing skin parts with a view + template, using GenericSetup for installation and migrate existing redirections on install. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Zaktualizowany dla Plone 3 poprzez użycie redirector plone.app.redirector,wymianę części skórki z widokiem+szablon,użycie GenericSetup do instalacji i migrację istniejących przekierowań przy instalacji.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Use new permission “RedirectionTool: Modify aliases” for the alias tab. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Use new permission “RedirectionTool: Modify aliases” for the alias tab. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Using The RedirectionTool
trans-unit.target: 使用重定向工具

trans-unit.source: When adding an alias a security check is performed on the source path. This prevents users from linking to their own content from locations to which they normally don’t have access. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: When adding an alias a security check is performed on the source path. This prevents users from linking to their own content from locations to which they normally don’t have access. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: files from the locales directory, as these don’t need to be versioned. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: files from the locales directory, as these don’t need to be versioned. [WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: form in the controlpanel to include its form controls. [soerensigfusson, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Formularz w panelu kontrolnym w celu włączenia jego formy kontroli.[soerensigfusson,hannosch]

trans-unit.source: update to use z3c.form so it’ll work with Plone 5 [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: update to use z3c.form so it’ll work with Plone 5 [vangheem]
